mapper.select: select f.id formId,f.formName,f.cover,f.createTime,count(fd.musicId) as musicNum from form f left join form_details fd on f.id=fd.formId where f.userId=#{userId} group by f.id

select f.id formId,f.formName,f.cover,f.createTime,count(fd.musicId) as musicNum from form f left join form_details fd on f.id=fd.formId left join form_collect fc on f.id=fc.formId where fc.userId=#{userId} group by f.id

select s.id singerId,s.name singerName,s.portrait,count(m.id) musicNum from singer_collect sc left join singer s on s.id=sc.singerId left join music m on m.singerId=sc.singerId where sc.userId=#{userId} group by sc.singerId
